title: Report Reveals Why Barack Obama Hasn't Endorsed Kamala Harris In US Polls
content: Many Democratic leaders have backed Kamala Harris as the party's new US Presidential candidate, but ex-president Barack Obama has held off so far.
summary: Many Democratic leaders have backed Kamala Harris as the party's new US Presidential candidate, but ex-president Barack Obama has held off so far.

title: Obama Praises Biden's "Lifetime Of Service" Following Oval Office Address
content: Former US President Barack Obama commended President Joe Biden's dedication to the nation in light of Joe Biden's recent Oval Office address, marking a pivotal moment in American politics.
summary: Former US President Barack Obama commended President Joe Biden's dedication to the nation in light of Joe Biden's recent Oval Office address, marking a pivotal moment in American politics.

title: Explained: Why Paris 2024 Will Be The Most High-Risk Olympics In History
content: The Paris Olympic Games will be one of the most high-risk in history owing to a combination of internal strife within France and heightened global geopolitical tensions.
summary: The Paris Olympic Games will be one of the most high-risk in history owing to a combination of internal strife within France and heightened global geopolitical tensions.

title: US, Canada Intercept China, Russia Planes Near Alaska
content: American and Canadian warplanes intercepted two Russian and two Chinese bombers in international airspace near the state of Alaska on Wednesday, the joint US-Canadian North American Aerospace Defense Command (NORAD) said.
summary: American and Canadian warplanes intercepted two Russian and two Chinese bombers in international airspace near the state of Alaska on Wednesday, the joint US-Canadian North American Aerospace Defense Command (NORAD) said.

title: "Russia's Most Beautiful Biker" Dies In Motorbike Crash In Turkey
content: A bike ride took a deadly turn for a 38-year-old Russian social media influencer in Turkey after she crashed into a truck while riding her red BMW motorcycle.
summary: A bike ride took a deadly turn for a 38-year-old Russian social media influencer in Turkey after she crashed into a truck while riding her red BMW motorcycle.

title: US Lawmaker Hold Ups "War Criminal" Sign During Netanyahu's Congress Speech
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's address to a joint session of the US Congress on Wednesday sparked controversy and division among lawmakers and US citizens.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's address to a joint session of the US Congress on Wednesday sparked controversy and division among lawmakers and US citizens.

title: What Donald Trump Said On Joe Biden's First Speech After Exiting US Polls
content: Joe Biden made his first televised address today since quitting the 2024 US presidential elections earlier this week.
summary: Joe Biden made his first televised address today since quitting the 2024 US presidential elections earlier this week.

title: New Footage Shows US Officers Standing Over Body Of Trump Shooter
content: Soon after the attempted assassination of Donald Trump, local law enforcement officers and a U.S. Secret Service agent discussed how pictures of the shooter were shared among officers by a sniper who lost sight of him before he opened fire.
summary: Soon after the attempted assassination of Donald Trump, local law enforcement officers and a U.S. Secret Service agent discussed how pictures of the shooter were shared among officers by a sniper who lost sight of him before he opened fire.

title: Dropped Out Of Presidential Race To "Unite My Party": Joe Biden
content: US President Joe Biden told Americans Wednesday that he had dropped out of the 2024 election to unite his party and his country, saying in a historic Oval Office speech that it was time to pass the torch to "younger voices."
summary: US President Joe Biden told Americans Wednesday that he had dropped out of the 2024 election to unite his party and his country, saying in a historic Oval Office speech that it was time to pass the torch to "younger voices."

title: "She's Experienced, Tough, Capable": Joe Biden Praises Kamala Harris
content: Biden also told Americans that he had dropped out of the 2024 election to unite his party and his country, saying in a historic Oval Office speech that it was time to pass the torch to "younger voices."
summary: Biden also told Americans that he had dropped out of the 2024 election to unite his party and his country, saying in a historic Oval Office speech that it was time to pass the torch to "younger voices."

title: No One More Qualified Than Kamala Harris For Presidential Race: White House
content: White House Press Secretary, Karine Jean Pierre emphasised that no one is more qualified to step in as the Democratic Party's presidential nominee than US Vice President Kamala Harris.
summary: White House Press Secretary, Karine Jean Pierre emphasised that no one is more qualified to step in as the Democratic Party's presidential nominee than US Vice President Kamala Harris.

title: "Passing Torch To Next Generation": Joe Biden On Exiting US President Race
content: President Joe Biden called the United States the "most powerful idea" in world history Wednesday, in a televised speech from the Oval Office days after announcing he would drop out from the White House race.
summary: President Joe Biden called the United States the "most powerful idea" in world history Wednesday, in a televised speech from the Oval Office days after announcing he would drop out from the White House race.

title: Gaza Ceasefire Negotiations Appear To Be In Closing Stages: US
content: Negotiations on a ceasefire-for-hostages deal in the Gaza conflict appear to be in their closing stages and U.S. President Joe Biden and Israeli PM Benjamin Netanyahu will discuss remaining gaps on Thursday, a senior U.S. official said on Wednesday.
summary: Negotiations on a ceasefire-for-hostages deal in the Gaza conflict appear to be in their closing stages and U.S. President Joe Biden and Israeli PM Benjamin Netanyahu will discuss remaining gaps on Thursday, a senior U.S. official said on Wednesday.

title: Trump Attacker Searched Online About John F Kennedy Shooting: FBI
content: The gunman who attempted to assassinate Donald Trump at a campaign rally searched online for details about the November 1963 shooting of US president John F. Kennedy in the days before the attack, the FBI director said Wednesday.
summary: The gunman who attempted to assassinate Donald Trump at a campaign rally searched online for details about the November 1963 shooting of US president John F. Kennedy in the days before the attack, the FBI director said Wednesday.

title: At Campaign Rally, Trump Calls Kamala Harris A "Radical Left Lunatic"
content: Donald Trump accused US Vice President Kamala Harris of being a "radical left lunatic" Wednesday, in his first rally since she became the de facto Democratic Party nominee in the White House race.
summary: Donald Trump accused US Vice President Kamala Harris of being a "radical left lunatic" Wednesday, in his first rally since she became the de facto Democratic Party nominee in the White House race.

title: Salman Rushdie Attacker Indicted On Terrorism Charges
content: The man accused of trying to kill the author Salman Rushdie has been charged with terrorism for allegedly acting on behalf of Hezbollah, according to documents unsealed Wednesday.
summary: The man accused of trying to kill the author Salman Rushdie has been charged with terrorism for allegedly acting on behalf of Hezbollah, according to documents unsealed Wednesday.

title: "Iran's Useful Idiots": Netanyahu Slams Anti-Israel Protesters In US Speech
content: Protesters opposed to the devastating war in Gaza are "Iran's useful idiots," Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said in a speech to the US Congress Wednesday, claiming that Tehran is funding the demonstrations.
summary: Protesters opposed to the devastating war in Gaza are "Iran's useful idiots," Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said in a speech to the US Congress Wednesday, claiming that Tehran is funding the demonstrations.

title: America, Israel "Must Stand Together": Netanyahu Addresses US Congress
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu appealed for his country and the United States to stand together in a landmark speech Wednesday aimed at rallying support in a US Congress split over his military campaign in Gaza.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu appealed for his country and the United States to stand together in a landmark speech Wednesday aimed at rallying support in a US Congress split over his military campaign in Gaza.

title: Kamala Harris Calls On 6,000 Black Women To Help Power Her Campaign
content: U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris called on a rally of more than 6,000 Black women on Wednesday to help her revitalize the Democratic presidential campaign, ahead of her Republican rival Donald Trump's return to the campaign trail.
summary: U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris called on a rally of more than 6,000 Black women on Wednesday to help her revitalize the Democratic presidential campaign, ahead of her Republican rival Donald Trump's return to the campaign trail.

title: CrowdStrike Says 'Bug In Content Validator" Caused Global Tech Outage
content: CrowdStrike, the cybersecurity company that caused a global computer outage last week, on Wednesday said that the breakdown stemmed from a flaw in its test software.
summary: CrowdStrike, the cybersecurity company that caused a global computer outage last week, on Wednesday said that the breakdown stemmed from a flaw in its test software.
